longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Cook Isl. must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a Certificate of Identity issued by the
  Government of New Zealand to those not able to obtain a
  national passport.

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- Minors entering New Zealand 
Warning:
- Visitors holding a visa that specifies the requirement to
  hold an outward ticket must hold return/onward tickets. (SEE
  NOTE 53749)
    NOTE 53749: Exempt are holders of authorization issued by
   New Zealand's immigration authorities waiving the return
   ticket requirement
